name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full-stack application development. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Ruby on Rails**, with a solid foundation in **Postgres** and **Redis** for data management. Skilled in deploying scalable solutions using **AWS CDK** and **Docker**, optimizing application performance and reliability.
Demonstrated expertise in creating high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors, with a strong focus on compliance-driven development standards. Knowledgeable in AI/ML-based solutions, facilitating predictive analytics and automation. Proven track record in implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines to enhance development workflows.
